aboutParagraphs: Experienced Data Engineer specializing in designing, developing, and optimizing scalable data pipelines and analytics solutions across finance, telecom, insurance, and healthcare domains. Skilled in leveraging big data technologies such as Apache Spark, Hadoop, Kafka, and Hive, combined with cloud platforms including AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure to deliver reliable, high-performance data workflows for both batch and real-time processing.

Proficient in advanced SQL and data modeling techniques to build efficient data warehouses and lakes that support business intelligence and predictive analytics. Adept at automation, CI/CD pipelines, and infrastructure-as-code to ensure rapid, repeatable, and secure deployment of data applications. Strong programming background in Python, Java, and Scala, with expertise in RESTful API development and microservices architecture.

Committed to collaborating with cross-functional teams—including data science, product management, and DevOps—to translate complex business requirements into actionable, production-ready data solutions that drive impactful insights and operational excellence.
